block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT
Meriden Public hearing on an application by Optasite Towers and Omnipoint Communications. Thursday at 3 p.m. and 7 p.m. Meriden City Hall, 142 East Main Street. (203) 630-4030.
New Britain Energy and telecommunications meeting. Tuesday at 1:30 p.m. Connecticut Siting Council, 10 Franklin Square. (860) 827-2935.
New Britain Prehearing conference on an application by Sprint Nextel Corporation. Wednesday at 10 a.m. Connecticut Siting Council, 10 Franklin Square. (860) 827-2935.
Rocky Hill Tourism Committee. Tuesday at 12:30 p.m. 999 West Street, board room. (860) 256-2800.
FAIRFIELD COUNTY
Danbury Common Council. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500.
Darien Charter Revision Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.
Newtown Zoning Board of Appeals. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Newtown Town Hall South, 3 Main Street. (203) 426-6470.
Redding Board of Selectmen. Monday at 7 p.m. Redding Town Hall, 100 Hill Road. (203) 938-2002.
Ridgefield Youth Commission. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Ridgefield Town Hall, 400 Main Street. (203) 431-2700.
Trumbull Zoning Board of Appeals public hearing. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Trumbull Town Hall, 5866 Main Street. (203) 452-5000.
Wilton Conservation Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Wilton Town Hall, 238 Danbury Road. (203) 563-0100.
HARTFORD COUNTY
Avon Town Council. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Avon Town Hall, 60 West Main Street. (860) 409-4300.
Avon Inland Wetlands Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Avon Town Hall, 60 West Main Street. (860) 409-4300.
Hartford Citizens Network of the Capital Region forum. Thursday at 6:30 p.m. Hartford Public Library, 500 Main Street. (860) 695-6324.
Simsbury Annual Town Meeting on the budget. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Simsbury High School auditorium, 34 Farms Village Road. (860) 658-3200.
LITCHFIELD COUNTY
Barkhamsted Conservation Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Barkhamsted Town Hall, 67 Ripley Hill Road. (860) 379-8285.
Cornwall Agricultural Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Cornwall Town Hall, 26 Pine Street. (860) 672-2709.
Goshen Inland Wetlands Commission. Tuesday at 7:15 p.m. Goshen Town Hall, 42 North Street. (860) 491-2308.
New Milford Conservation Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. New Milford Town Hall, 10 Main Street. (860) 355-6020.
New Milford Planning Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. New Milford Town Hall, 10 Main Street. (860) 355-6020.
Roxbury Recreation Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Roxbury Town Hall, 29 North Street. (860) 354-9938.
MIDDLESEX COUNTY
Chester Harbor Management Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Chester Town Hall, 203 Middlesex Avenue. (860) 526-0013.
Portland Inland Wetlands Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Portland Library, 20 Freestone Avenue. (860) 342-6770.
NEW HAVEN COUNTY
Cheshire Energy Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Cheshire Town Hall, 84 South Main Street. (203) 271-6660.
Orange Safety Commission. Wednesday at 9 a.m. Orange Town Hall, 617 Orange Center Road. (203) 891-2122.
Woodstock Town Plan and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Woodstock Town Hall, 415 Route 169. (860) 928-6595.
NEW LONDON COUNTY
Baltic Sprague Parks and Recreation Committee. Thursday at 7 p.m. Sprague Town Hall, 1 Main Street. (860) 822-8075.
Groton Representative Town Meeting annual budget meeting. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Groton Senior Center, 102 Newtown Road. (860) 441-6640.
Groton Permanent School Building Committee. Thursday at 7 p.m. Groton Town Hall, 45 Fort Hill Road. (860) 441-6640.
TOLLAND COUNTY
Andover Board of Selectmen. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Old Firehouse, Center Street. (860) 742-7305.
Tolland Economic Development Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 a.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
Tolland Inland Wetlands Commission. Thursday at 7 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
WINDHAM COUNTY
Danielson Special Town Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Killingly Town Hall, 172 Main Street. (860) 779-5300.
Pomfret Inland Wetlands and Watercourses Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Pomfret Town Hall, 5 Haven Road. (860) 974-0343.
